scripts.deploy:branch: npm run build && robocopy .\out .\docs /MIR && powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType file -Path .\docs\.nojekyll -Force | Out-Null" && git add docs && git commit -m "Deploy (Next15 build→out→/docs)" && git push
scripts.redeploy: git commit --allow-empty -m "chore: force redeploy GitHub Pages" && git push
